Aloha!
Dream. Learn. Code. Create.
Meet Cherie

Cherie Pavico

Full Stack Developer

Being passionately curious throughout my professional career has led me to become a full-stack web developer. I have a strong drive to acquire more knowledge and apply what I have learned to help others build their businesses and to help companies serve their customers.

Technology and creativity has always been the driving force behind my career and hobbies. I really enjoy collaborating with a team to bring an idea to life, troubleshooting bugs, learning and trying new technology, and moving projects forward. I love being a part of an industry that is constantly growing, expanding, and learning.

Feel free to connect with me! Let's talk about web development, technology, legos, puppies, or how I can be of help to your team or business!

Courses

Through my career, I've picked up a few tips and tricks. Sharing what I've learned to help others has been very rewarding. Not only do I get to learn new tools, but I get to help others with their businesses along the way.

Level Up Your Videos
A course for business owners new to filming. Teaching the tricks of the trade to have a quick, easy & successful shoot.
Check it out!

What other's are saying

I had the pleasure of working with Cherie in the past. I was impressed with her creativity, energy, and ability to motivate team members. Her ambition helped elevate the performance of everyone around her. Her ability to multitask without losing focus is a rare skill to master. Being an exceptionally fast learner, she was able to design and develop webpages and conversions funnels that helped increase customer awareness and drive acquisition. Cherie would be an invaluable addition to any team. She is a superstar in her field.

Pamela Talevski
Marketing Executive, Just Food For Dogs

Ms. Pavico is highly creative and insightful. But even more impressive is her ability to collaborate. She will work with your amorphous wants and needs and create tangible product that you and/or your customers will appreciate. I highly recommend adding Ms. Pavico to your creative and design process.

Troy Obrero
Founder, Co-Founder, or Principal
Prometheus Athletics, TOCORE DNA Sequencing, The Rusted Key, DaddyKamp, SimplyBe.Fit, NoBull Specialty Foods

It's always a massive pleasure to work with Cherie. She's a kick-ass artist and an absolute professional!
Her attention to detail and ability to receive and address feedback makes her a valuable asset to any production.

Jake Akuna
CEO/Visual Effects Supervisor, VFX2GO

I worked with Cherie on a variety of projects over the course of two years. From YouTube and filming social media cooking shows, to long-form client testimonials and 2,000+ person seminars. Not only is she one of the most tech-savvy people I know, and someone our entire team looked to for answers, she's also extremely smart and collaborative when it comes to growing a business, attracting customers and understanding the ever-changing landscape of social media. Her greatest gift is her patience in stressful situations, and her ability to help those around her shine. Whether she's calmly directing on-camera talent or perfecting a set, her poised demeanor and skillful eye make every job go smoothly. Cherie is one of those irreplaceable people whose warmth is infectious. Aside from being extremely efficient, like quickly editing videos and immediately capturing people's essence on camera, her goodness is what sets her apart from others in her field. To find talent with heart is one of those magical equations that's hard to find, except with Cherie. It's a feeling of comfort, protectiveness and honesty when you work with her, and once you experience it, you never want to settle for less.

Erin Woodbury
Media Chef/Blogger
